Producer: Jason Blum, Sherryl Clark, Matthew Kaplan
Production Co: Chapter One, IM Global, Blumhouse Productions, Busted Shark
Rating: R (Some Language|Sexual References|Disturbing Violent Content|Teen Partying)
Synopsis: Separated from their father (Michael Kelly), two teenage sisters (Sofia Black-D'Elia, Analeigh Tipton) try to survive an apocalyptic viral outbreak that leads to a quarantine.
Title: Viral
